item.title: Huawei Compiler & PL Lab Workshop 2024
item.description:
Overview

The Huawei Compiler & PL Lab and University of Leeds Collaboration Workshop offers a unique opportunity to explore cutting-edge research and collaboration in compiler technologies and programming languages. Join us for insightful discussions and a team lunch.

Workshop Details

Subject
Huawei Compiler & PL Lab and University of Leeds Collaboration Workshop & Team Lunch

Time
11/21 (Thur) 12:00 - 16:00 (UTC+00:00), London

Location
Room 1.34 in Sir William Henry Bragg Building

item.title: AI Workshop 2024
item.description:
Overview

The AI Workshop 2024 is designed to bring together researchers and practitioners in the field of artificial intelligence. This workshop will cover the latest trends and research in AI, including machine learning, natural language processing, and robotics.

item.title: Enhancing Deployment-time Predictive Model Robustness for Code Analysis and Optimization
Introducing Compiler Semantics into Large Language Models as Programming Language Translators: A Case Study of C to x86 Assembly
Iterative Refinement of Project-Level Code Context for Precise Code Generation with Compiler Feedback
M4Secure: Making Memory Management More Secure
